pages.text: Magical rings are not an uncommon sight, as they often provide great benefits to their wearer.$(br2)With this fact in mind, it's only natural that covalence dust would lend itself well to making its own set of powerful rings.

Simply coating a ring made from iron in a mixture of all three types of covalence dust increases its strength, both physical and magical. This new ring has no innate magical properties, but can act as a strong base for ones that do.
